description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget named FavoritesPage, which displays a list of the user's favorite recipes. It imports various Flutter packages and project-specific providers and widgets. The widget retrieves favorite recipes from state providers and renders either a message indicating no favorites or a list of RecipeCard widgets for each favorite recipe.

classes.name: FavoritesPage
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays the user's favorite recipes, either as a message if none are saved or as a list of RecipeCard widgets.

methods.name: FavoritesPage.build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the FavoritesPage, including fetching favorite data and rendering the list or a message.
